item.title: p_r_a_x_i_s add a quote by Jesse Ventura
item.description: "Organized religion is a sham and a crutch for weak-minded people who need strength in numbers. It tells people to go out and stick their noses in other people's business. I live by the golden rule: Treat others as you'd want them to treat you. The religious right wants to tell people how to live." -- Jesse Ventura

item.title: p_r_a_x_i_s add a quote by Sean O'Casey
item.description: "When it was dark, you always carried the sun in your hand for me." -- Sean O'Casey

item.title: p_r_a_x_i_s add a quote by Coco Chanel
item.description: "The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud." -- Coco Chanel

item.title: p_r_a_x_i_s add a quote by Peter S. Beagle
item.description: "Great heroes need great sorrows and burdens, or half their greatness goes unnoticed. It is all part of the fairy tale." -- Peter S. Beagle

item.title: p_r_a_x_i_s add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Give a man a fire and he's warm for a day, but set fire to him and he's warm for the rest of his life." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: p_r_a_x_i_s add a quote by Mortimer J. Adler
item.description: "True freedom is impossible without a mind made free by discipline." -- Mortimer J. Adler

item.title: p_r_a_x_i_s add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: p_r_a_x_i_s add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "Life will not break your heart. It'll crush it." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: p_r_a_x_i_s add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "Writing what you wished was the most dangerous form of wishful thinking." -- Amy Tan
